title: Peer Feedback Pedagogy for Simulation-Based Critical Thinking Development in K-12 Education

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental scientific theories and experimental methodologies
context.additional_context: Instructional design combining science lab simulations/VR tools with peer assessment in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the validity of science experiment results with over 80% accuracy through peer evaluation feedback

Learners apply a multi-stage critical thinking process (problem definition-hypothesis formulation-conclusion derivation) of at least three levels to scientific problems presented in VR simulation environments
Learners provide structured feedback (with at least three specific improvement points) on peers' science experiment designs

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
